net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.external

Class SaveResourceExternalAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.external.SaveResourceExternalAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, ActionListener, ExternalAction

    public final class SaveResourceExternalAction
extends Object
implements ExternalAction, ActionListener
    Allows a resource to be saved. The medium will decide where and how to do this.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)
